plot: Max's temporary relief from tight shoes ends in embarrassment when he is compelled to retrieve them from his fiancée's dog.
title: Le soulier trop petit
plot_es: Max's temporary relief from tight shoes ends in embarrassment when he is compelled to retrieve them from his fiancée's dog.
plot_en: Max's temporary relief from tight shoes ends in embarrassment when he is compelled to retrieve them from his fiancée's dog.
